SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mr. Nick Kelly’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope people see that education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world…”

– Mr. Nick Kelly, Kindergarten Educator @FCASD @SaintFrancisPA @CalUofPA https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/education-powerful-weapon-to-change-world/
